duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead coaching teams through strategy, discovery, prioritization, and execution of training, consulting, and coaching engagements for matrixed, cross-function teams across the firm.

Partner closely with key stakeholders and leaders across the firm such as Digital Shared & Enabling Services (DS&ES) teams, Transformation Culture & Communications (TCC) teams, Digital Product Management (DPM), Transformation Office, Human Capital & Value Team Leaders.
Lead the development and optimization of capabilities, processes, and services to enable product and agile transformation for business teams.
Demonstrate exceptional communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to define and cast directional vision across all organizational levels.
Overcome complexity and ambiguity to deliver transformative results.
Positively represent the Product & Agile Center of Excellence (PACE).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree or relevant experience (Masters preferred)
Certifications such as ICP-ACC, CSM-CSP, SPC or equivalent experience
